Title: Na Maloom Afraad 2
Actors: Hania Aamir, Ashiq Ahmed, Nayyar Ejaz, Mohsin Abbas Haider
Plot: This is a sequel to 2014 comedy "Na Maloom Afrad" ("Unknown men") with same lead cast and characters. Three unfortunate souls plan a big heist on their shortcut to wealth but things go comically wrong along the way.
